messages.title: Thanking residents for the warm reception
messages.content: This is just a quick note to say thank you for the warm reception I and the Lib Dem team have received when calling round locally.

mentions.tacticalSituation: At the last local elections, the Lib Dems came a close second to Labour. At the last General Election, we came second, with 5,000 votes. My election agent tells me that this time around it's set to be a close finish between the local Lib Dem team and Labour.

issues.governance: Many people across Lewisham have told me they'll be voting for the local Lib Dems. They want a hard-working local MP who will always put our area first, and are keen to put an end to 38 years of Labour rule at Lewisham Town Hall.

leaflet.additionalNotes: People like the fact that the Lib Dems don't just turn up at election time. Our councillors and campaigners have worked hard all year-round for our community.
